articles.title: 'No good deed goes unpunished by EU!' Brussels sparks outrage after 'bullying' AstraZeneca - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EUROPEAN UNION has provoked outrage in the UK after announcing it was taking legal action against vaccine producer AstraZeneca.
